descriptionHtml:
*************************************************************************************************************************************************************************************
There are three elements in all Elder Scrolls games - Fire, Frost & Shock. But there are only Fire and Frost dragons in Skyrim. No Shock dragons. So, those who want Shock dragons too in Skyrim, this mod will hopefully do the trick.
*************************************************************************************************************************************************************************************

I didn\'t put much thought to this mod. Just added shock breaths and shock storms to the dragons and edited a little bit here and there. So please don\'t expect beautiful blue dragons swooping down from the sky.
I was quite surprised when I found out that no one thought of a shock dragon in the forum! Is the idea really bad? Hoping to find out.
Enjoy the mod!
author: Debdut
